Package io.micronaut.jaxrs.runtime.ext.bind

Class SimpleSecurityContextBinder

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.jaxrs.runtime.ext.bind.SimpleSecurityContextBinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ArgumentBinder<SecurityContext,HttpRequest<?>>, TypeArgumentBinder<SecurityContext,HttpRequest<?>>, RequestArgumentBinder<SecurityContext>, TypedRequestArgumentBinder<SecurityContext>
Direct Known Subclasses:
MicronautSecurityContextBinder
@Singleton public class SimpleSecurityContextBinder extends Object implements TypedRequestArgumentBinder<SecurityContext>
A simple implementation the binds the JAX-RS SecurityContext without support for roles.
Since:
3.1.0
Author:
graemerocher
